languages.text: "Теперь можно считать, что ты не проклят. Ты почти обрел свою погибель в бою".
"Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."
languages.original_text: "Теперь можно считать, что ты не проклят. Ты почти обрел свою погибель в бою".

traits.locale_text: "Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."
"Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."
"Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."
"Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."

languages.text: “现在我可以肯定地说，你并没有遭到诅咒，因为那场战斗差点就要了你的。”
languages.original_text: "Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."

traits.locale_text: “现在我可以肯定地说，你并没有遭到诅咒，因为那场战斗差点就要了你的。”

languages.text: 「これでお前は呪われてないと安心して言えるな。戦いで死にかけはしたが」
languages.original_text: "Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."

traits.locale_text: 「これでお前は呪われてないと安心して言えるな。戦いで死にかけはしたが」

languages.text: «Ahora sabemos que no está maldito. Casi encuentra la muerte en esa batalla».
languages.original_text: "Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora sabemos que no está maldito. Casi encuentra la muerte en esa batalla».

languages.text: « Nous pouvons désormais affirmer avec certitude que vous n'êtes pas maudit, puisque vous avez failli perdre la vie au combat. »
languages.original_text: "Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."

traits.locale_text: « Nous pouvons désormais affirmer avec certitude que vous n'êtes pas maudit, puisque vous avez failli perdre la vie au combat. »

languages.text: "Wir können jetzt sicher sagen, dass Ihr nicht verflucht seid – Ihr wärt beinahe im Kampf gestorben."
languages.original_text: "Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."

traits.locale_text: "Wir können jetzt sicher sagen, dass Ihr nicht verflucht seid – Ihr wärt beinahe im Kampf gestorben."

languages.text: "Artık lanetli olmadığına eminiz. Savaşta az kalsın ölüyordun."
languages.original_text: "Now we can safely say that you are not cursed — you almost met your end in battle."

traits.locale_text: "Artık lanetli olmadığına eminiz. Savaşta az kalsın sonun geliyordu."
